# The `AMDGPUAnnotateUniformValues.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This pass adds amdgpu.uniform metadata to IR values so this information can be used during instruction selection. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This pass adds amdgpu.uniform metadata to IR values so this information can be used during instruction selection.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;re tracking up to the Function boundaries, and cannot go beyond because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of FunctionPass restrictions. We can ensure that is memory not clobbered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for memory operations that are live in to entry points only.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!isEntryFunc)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GlobalLoad = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getPointerAddressSpace() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpuas/#a899ad5bfccfc22965a6714929a3dfae1abf4559ef958a13c33f6ec7ed13fd44e5">AMDGPUAS::GLOBAL&#95;ADDRESS</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GlobalLoad &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#af55cf9792d5f9186df02c58b337a1511">AMDGPU::isClobberedInFunction</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, MSSA, AA))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">    setNoClobberMetadata(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
